[[Image:Fellay.jpg|thumb|Bishop Bernard Fellay (in front of a painting of [[Pope Pius X]]), current Superior General of the [[Society of St. Pius X]].]]
 
'''Bernard Fellay''', [[Society of St. Pius X|SSPX]] (born 12 April 1958) is a [[Catholic]] [[Bishop]] and [[superior general]] of the [[Traditionalist Catholic]] [[Society of St. Pius X]]. Fellay was declared [[Excommunication|excommunicated]] ''[[latae sententiae]]'' in 1988 by the [[Roman Catholic Church]] because of his [[EcÃ´ne Consecrations|unauthorized consecration]] by [[Marcel Lefebvre|Archbishop Marcel Lefebvre]], deemed by the [[Holy See]] to be "unlawful" and "a [[Schism (religion)|schismatic]] act".<ref>[http://www.vatican.va/holy_father/john_paul_ii/motu_proprio/documents/hf_jp-ii_motu-proprio_02071988_ecclesia-dei_en.html Apostolic Letter 'Ecclesia Dei']</ref> The excommunication was lifted by the Holy See in January 2009.<ref name="212.77.1.245">[http://212.77.1.245/news_services/bulletin/news/23250.php?index=23250&po_date=24.01.2009&lang=ge Remissione Della Scomunica Latae Sententiae Ai Vescovi Della FratertinÃ  Sacerdotale San Pio X, 24.01.2009]</ref>
'''Bernard Fellay''', [[Society of St. Pius X|SSPX]] (born 12 April 1958) is a [[Catholic]] [[Bishop]] and [[superior general]] of the [[Traditionalist Catholic]] [[Society of St. Pius X]]. Fellay was declared [[Excommunication|excommunicated]] ''[[latae sententiae]]'' in 1988 by the [[Roman Catholic Church]] because of his [[EcÃ´ne Consecrations|unauthorized consecration]] by [[Marcel Lefebvre|Archbishop Marcel Lefebvre]], deemed by the [[Holy See]] to be "unlawful" and "a [[Schism (religion)|schismatic]] act".<ref>[http://www.vatican.va/holy_father/john_paul_ii/motu_proprio/documents/hf_jp-ii_motu-proprio_02071988_ecclesia-dei_en.html Apostolic Letter 'Ecclesia Dei']</ref> The excommunication was lifted by the Holy See in January 2009.<ref name="212.77.1.245">[http://212.77.1.245/news_services/bulletin/news/23250.php?index=23250&po_date=24.01.2009&lang=ge Remissione Della Scomunica Latae Sententiae Ai Vescovi Della FratertinÃ  Sacerdotale San Pio X, 24.01.2009]</ref>
